text:
Repost.
06 Nov 2019, 07:35 by kaa063
‚Äº‚Äº‚Äº üÜò ‚Äº‚Äº‚Äº Arkhangelsk region asks for help! We are starting a civil war. If the landfill is destined to be, then not only our rivers will be infected, but it will also affect the ecology of the nearest regions. Maximum REPOST! Copy to your page! We are not asking you for something supernatural. We ask you to pass this record 3 to your friends, and maybe this action will help to convey to the media the great environmental problem of the north, maybe thanks to you thousands, millions of people will know. A big request to read to the end. This is a problem that can affect everyone. Why does everyone love to remember how well they lived under the USSR? The answer is simple - before everything was done for the life of every person and people were united! And in our time everything is done for a certain stratum of society ... And then the trouble got to the NORTH, to those places where there is still clean air, clean land, clean water, clean forests, but for now ..... After all, not everyone is happy that someone is living well, and now such an attack now in the Arkhangelsk region, in a place not touched by civilization, they begin preparations for the construction of a landfill ... Not just garbage will be dumped there, but garbage from all over the Moscow region, Isn't there enough recycling garbage plants? Just imagine what will happen to forests, land, water, air, nature - this will be a new environmental epidemic. And there is no where this information: they are silent in the news, no one knows, and only the locals, and now the nearby cities, as they can, resist this, stand by the wall and do not miss the equipment, how long will they last? Yes, we think WE will stand our ground until the last ... We have nowhere to retreat !! We just want to tell as many people as possible about this, bring it to everyone ... And there we‚Äôll break through, as they say, guys ... Rosguard was introduced in Shies at 4 in the morning. Martial law is in the nearby village of Urdoma. Roads are blocked. Disconnected communications, Internet, electricity. Speak, not a war? Which goes on all fronts of social life. On October 15, Presidential Plenipotentiary Envoy to the Northwestern Federal District Alexander Vladimirovich Gutsan flew to Syktyvkar, who held a meeting on the construction of a landfill for Moscow garbage in the Arkhangelsk region near the Shies station. The republic‚Äôs authorities denied this topic of conversation, but that evening, a representative of Technopark LLC, executive director Oleg Pankratov (a garbage man), was in a hurry leaving the republic‚Äôs capital at the Syktyvkar airport. 3 days after the closed meeting, the Minister of the Ministry of Internal Affairs of the Republic of Komi Viktor Nikolayevich Polonikov arrived at the Koster post at the Shies station. And on October 23, early in the morning, the Syktyvkar OMON, the Russian Guard and the police took control of all the roads to Shies and ensured the breakthrough of several fuel trucks through the posts of activists. Until this moment, the Ministry of Internal Affairs in Komi avoided openly interfering in this dirty garbage story, but after the plenipotentiary arrived, to see, it was decided to get dirty. An order was given to subordinates and the traitors of their land ran to cover the Moscow garbage invaders. Today, the policemen have secured themselves: the heroic village of Urdom, which for many months has blocked the passage of fuel trucks from the Arkhangelsk region, has almost been taken into the siege by the police. They cut off electricity, wired internet, blocked roads. Communication with the village is maintained only as long as the phones of the people there are holding a charge. This is almost an open declaration of war on his people! As a result of today's ‚Äúspecial operation‚Äù several offenses were recorded: 1. Night moving of fuel trucks is prohibited by the rules for the transport of dangerous goods 2. Their movement on dirt municipal roads, during the period of the ban (roads are closed) there are no passes. 3. Driving along the highway without coordination with the gas workers (broken barrier) 4. Crossing the railway tracks in violation of traffic rules. 5. Violation of the rules for the carriage of passengers (it is impossible to carry passengers on a fuel truck, especially on a towing device) 6. Draining fuel in a place not equipped for this purpose, storing fuel and lubricants on an ‚Äúunformed‚Äù site. Bottom line: the President sent his man to deal with the reasons for the "stop" of the construction of the garbage. He in the office of the head of the region, forced the head of the Ministry of Internal Affairs to organize escort of fuel trucks from the Komi Republic through the settlements of the Arkhangelsk region. Having exceeded his authority, the Minister of the Ministry of Internal Affairs organized a ‚Äúspecial operation‚Äù to protect the PRIVATE cargo destined for the PRIVATE organization. Draw your own conclusions. I need your help, friends, with the maximum dissemination of information - be sure to REPOST this entry. Do not hesitate - tomorrow the occupation power may besiege any settlement in our country if it dares to rebel against injustice. If today you do not support the northerners even with the dissemination of information, then who will help you tomorrow? STAND UP PEOPLE RUSSIAN MOTHERLAND MOTHER CALLING!
